title: Pickwick papers
brief_description: The colourful BBC adaptation of the popular Dickens’ story which centres on the exploits of the Pickwick Club. Part 1. Messers Pickwick, Tupman, Snodgrass, and Winkle embark upon their uproarious and accident-prone adventures around England. Part 2. Conviviality and romance abound as the festive season approaches. But Pickwick is in trouble over his alleged breach of promise to Mrs Bardell resulting in a stint in prison. Narrated by Ray Brooks and starring Nigel Stock as Samuel Pickwick.
